chat_history.content:
Here are some popular dining spots and attractions in Palm Springs:

### Breakfast Spots

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").
current_city.title: Current City

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"
transportation.title: Transportation

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"
breakfast.title: Breakfast

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"
attraction.title: Attraction

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"
accommodation.title: Accommodation

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.
city.title: City

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.
city.title: City

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.
state.title: State

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.
departure_city.title: Departure City

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.
destination_city.title: Destination City

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.
date.title: Date

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.
origin.title: Origin

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.
destination.title: Destination

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.
city.title: City

chat_history.name: attraction_search

chat_history.content:
Here are some popular dining spots and attractions in Palm Springs:

### Breakfast Spots
1. **Bar Gernika Basque Pub & Eatery**
   - Cuisines: Tea, Pizza, Desserts, Fast Food
   - Average Cost: $50
   - Rating: 4.3

2. **Houndstooth Grill & Tavern**
   - Cuisines: Tea, Pizza, BBQ, Mediterranean
   - Average Cost: $47
   - Rating: 4.4

3. **Jaan**
   - Cuisines: Seafood, Mexican, Fast Food
   - Average Cost: $215
   - Rating: 3.8

### Lunch Spots
1. **Kahill's Steak-Fish Chophouse**
   - Cuisines: Cafe, Bakery, American
   - Average Cost: $38
   - Rating: 3.5

2. **Sugar & Spice - Le Marche**
   - Cuisines: Tea, French, Cafe
   - Average Cost: $33
   - Rating: 2.4

3. **Pizza Man**
   - Cuisines: Tea, Italian, Fast Food, Cafe, American
   - Average Cost: $55
   - Rating: 2.9

### Dinner Spots
1. **KFC**
   - Cuisines: Desserts, Italian, Bakery, Fast Food, Seafood
   - Average Cost: $64
   - Rating: 2.7

2. **Kake Da Hotel**
   - Cuisines: Tea, Pizza, Fast Food, Indian, Seafood
   - Average Cost: $83
   - Rating: 3.1

3. **Palaaram**
   - Cuisines: Desserts, Pizza, Italian, BBQ, Cafe
   - Average Cost: $63
   - Rating: 3.7

### Attractions
1. **Palm Springs Art Museum**
   - Address: 101 N Museum Dr, Palm Springs, CA 92262, USA
   - Phone: (760) 322-4800
   - Website: [psmuseum.org](https://www.psmuseum.org/)

2. **Walk of the Stars Palm Springs**
   - Address: 10 N Palm Canyon Dr, Palm Springs, CA 92262, USA
   - Website: [Facebook Page](https://www.facebook.com/Palm-Springs-Walk-of-Stars-171425349581866/)

3. **Moorten Botanical Garden**
   - Address: 1701 S Palm Canyon Dr, Palm Springs, CA 92264, USA
   - Phone: (760) 327-6555
   - Website: [moortenbotanicalgarden.com](http://www.moortenbotanicalgarden.com/)

4. **Palm Springs Aerial Tramway**
   - Address: 1 Tramway Rd, Palm Springs, CA 92262, USA
   - Phone: (760) 325-1391
   - Website: [pstramway.com](https://pstramway.com/)

5. **Indian Canyons**
   - Address: 38520 S Palm Canyon Dr, Palm Springs, CA 92264, USA
   - Phone: (760) 323-6018
   - Website: [indian-canyons.com](http://www.indian-canyons.com/)

6. **Palm Springs Air Museum**
   - Address: Parking, lot 745 N Gene Autry Trail, Palm Springs, CA 92262, USA
   - Phone: (760) 778-6262
   - Website: [palmspringsairmuseum.org](http://palmspringsairmuseum.org/)

7. **Palm Springs Historical Society**
   - Address: 221 S Palm Canyon Dr, Palm Springs, CA 92262, USA
   - Phone: (760) 323-8297
   - Website: [pshistoricalsociety.org](https://pshistoricalsociety.org/)

8. **Greater Palm Springs**
   - Address: 70100 CA-111, Rancho Mirage, CA 92270, USA
   - Phone: (760) 770-9000
   - Website: [visitgreaterpalmsprings.com](http://www.visitgreaterpalmsprings.com/)

9. **Frances Stevens Park**
   - Address: 500 N Palm Canyon Dr, Palm Springs, CA 92262, USA

10. **Palm Springs Welcome Sign**
    - Address: Palm Springs, CA 92262, USA

11. **Robolights**
    - Address: 1077 E Granvia Valmonte, Palm Springs, CA 92262, USA
    - Phone: (760) 774-0318
    - Website: [robochristmas.com](http://www.robochristmas.com/)

12. **The Living Desert Zoo and Gardens**
    - Address: 47900 Portola Ave, Palm Desert, CA 92260, USA
    - Phone: (760) 346-5694
    - Website: [livingdesert.org](https://www.livingdesert.org/)

13. **Wings**
    - Address: 111 N Palm Canyon Dr #180, Palm Springs, CA 92262, USA

14. **Agua Caliente Tahquitz Visitor Center**
    - Address: 500 W Mesquite Ave, Palm Springs, CA 92264, USA
    - Phone: (760) 416-7044
    - Website: [tahquitzcanyon.com](http://www.tahquitzcanyon.com/canyon)

15. **Shiprock**
    - Address: Palm Springs, CA 92262, USA

16. **Sonny Bono Statue**
    - Address: 155 S Palm Canyon Dr, Palm Springs, CA 92262, USA

17. **El Mirador Tower**
    - Address: N Indian Canyon Dr, Palm Springs, CA 92262, USA
    - Phone: (760) 323-6511
    - Website: [palmspringslife.com](https://www.palmspringslife.com/a-healthy-outcome-at-el-mirador/)

18. **Santa Rosa and San Jacinto Mountains National Monument Visitor Center**
    - Address: 51-500 CA-74, Palm Desert, CA 92260, USA
    - Phone: (760) 862-9984
    - Website: [blm.gov](https://www.blm.gov/programs/national-conservation-lands/california/santa-rosa-and-san-jacinto-mountains-national-monument)

19. **Palm Springs Art Museum Architecture and Design Center**
    - Address: 300 S Palm Canyon Dr, Palm Springs, CA 92262, USA
    - Phone: (760) 423-5260
    - Website: [psmuseum.org](http://www.psmuseum.org/architecture-design-center/)

20. **Agua Caliente Cultural Museum**
    - Address: 140 N Indian Canyon Dr, Palm Springs, CA 92262, USA
    - Phone: (760) 778-1079
    - Website: [accmuseum.org](http://www.accmuseum.org/)

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.
city.title: City

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.
city.title: City

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.
state.title: State

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.
departure_city.title: Departure City

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.
destination_city.title: Destination City

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.
date.title: Date

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.
origin.title: Origin

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.
destination.title: Destination

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.
city.title: City
